archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.2.10: Business requirements should take into account critical timescales associated with the target environment (i.e. the timescale beyond which the unavailability of a business process, service or application would be unacceptable to the organisation).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
